text: something that I'm extremely passionate
about in that I've loved since I was a
young child is writing and creativity in
general that includes music and the Arts
and I hope to combine business skills
that I'm equipped with here with this
goal this overarching passion I've had
telling good stories to audiences around
the world
I'm actually arranging two internships
for this summer the first one will be in
New York City at Lincoln Center for the
Performing Arts I will be working on the
Lincoln Center strategy planning team
including digital strategy marketing
education Across America Lincoln Center
actually has a Consulting project with
the Chinese government in developing the
classical arts in certain cities in
China they're starting with one but who
knows there might be the potential for
more in the future especially as that
giant market which I worked in before
coming to HBS has such an appetite for
the finer bits of entertainment
including classical Arts museums and
music ballet and dance Opera
I really want to be able to tell good
stories in China to Chinese audiences
and I hope that in the long run I'll
have that opportunity whether it's in
the Performing Arts and classical music
or it's in movies or or writing a book
my second internship will be in La at a
studio called Morata it was just founded
in 2010 and it's kind of a Cutting Edge
Studio that focuses on trans media
making not only movies but commercials
and shorter films
I started off joining the entertainment
and media club I'm grateful that I was
able to participate in the entertainment
and media conference that they hold
every year so we were able to round out
the film panel with people from movie
companies and startups or you know huge
companies people who were from the
business side as well as from the
creative side
but I think that people everywhere can
be a leader who makes a difference in
the world I want to find those stories
and I want to make them shine and and
make sure that they're told to inspire
more people to rise up and and really
find that leader within themselves and
make a difference in whatever capacity
they can
